pli-tv-pvr2.14:1.1: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr2.14:1.2: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.14:2.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr2.14:2.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ—āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
